.
{|abcde|}
.
<p><span id="abcde"></span></p>
.

.
s {|f|} test
.
<p>s <span id="f"></span> test</p>
.

.
bold with ** a line b{|foo|}reak in the middle ** of it
.
<p>bold with ** a line b<span id="foo"></span>reak in the middle ** of it</p>
.

coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
